item.title: [Srl]Princes IronMinerBanker V Test 0.85
item.dc:creator: @Bebemycat2 Bebe
item.description:
@Bebemycat2 wrote:

No need for this:

procedure Randoms_; Var X,y:integer; begin CloseWindow; Wait(1); FindLamp('mining'); Wait(1); FindDead; Wait(1); FindMod; Wait(1); FindMime; Wait(1); FindMaze; Wait(1); FindQuiz; Wait(1); FindFrog; Wait(1); FindDemon; Wait(1); if(FindFight)then RunTo(RDirection,false); Wait(1); GambleNewBox; Wait(1); FindPick; if not(Loggedin) then begin RandomNextPlayer(false); Wait(1); if FindGas(X,y) then RunTo(Rdirection,false); end; end;
Just use “FindNormalRandoms”

Alos try using “RadialRoadWalk”

Read full topic

item.title: [Srl]Princes IronMinerBanker V Test 0.85
item.dc:creator: @The_Prince_of_Random The Prince of Randomness
item.description:
@The_Prince_of_Random wrote:

-------------------------------Princes IronMinerBanker V 0.85---------------------------------------

Hey Everyone

Introduction:
This is my Test Version IronMinerBanker for SE varrock, it uses the latest AntiRandoms and uses Srl 2.2.
It uses some of my procedures that i have created or used from known Scripters.
use it wisely

SetUp.
The obvious Srl Setup.
Client. PlayerArray. Players all in one spot.
RockColor.

Known bugs
Walking back from bank is testy, may stuff up, tried to fix with the WalkingRandoms procedure,
Works fine on my computer but not on others

Thanks to, SDcit, Pyro , Wt Fakawi, XxKanexX, tushita <3

[code]program RandomMiner;
{.Script Info:

ScriptName = RandomMiner

Author = The Prince of Randomness?

Description = Mines And Banks In East Varrock

Version = Alpha V.08

Date = 29/04/06

Comments = Start anywhere in east varrock bank…

#Comments = Wield or have store in Inventory
/Script Info}

{.include SRL/SRL.scar}
{.include SRL/SRL/Skill/mining.scar}

{developers version}

var
MT,PrevCount:integer;
Lost_:boolean;

//Color Setup\

const
RockColor = 4153993;//at tin at the moment
M1 = 565;
M2 = 5;
M3 = 725;
M4 = 160;

//Mining Setup\
const
Powermine = false; //if you dont want to bank the ores
WieldPick = true; //Recommended

//Ignore This\
const
VersionNumber = ‘Beta V.2 =)’;
Improvements = ‘Standards, Sorry Everyone =(’;
S1 = 5;
S2 = 5;
S3 = 515;
S4 = 340;

Procedure DeclarePlayers;
begin
HowManyPlayers :=6;
NumberOfPlayers(HowManyPlayers);
CurrentPlayer:=0;

 Players[0].Name :='';
 Players[0].Pass :='';
 Players[0].Nick :='';
 Players[0].Loc  :='';
 Players[0].Skill:='Mining';
 Players[0].Active:=True;
 Players[0].Ore:='Random';
 
 Players[1].Name :='';
 Players[1].Pass :='';
 Players[1].Nick :='';
 Players[1].Loc  :='';
 Players[1].Skill:='Varrock';
 Players[1].Active:=True;
 Players[1].Ore:='Random';
 
 Players[2].Name :='';
 Players[2].Pass :='';
 Players[2].Nick :='';
 Players[2].Loc  :='';
 Players[2].Skill:='';
 Players[2].Active:=True;
 Players[2].Ore:='Random';
 
 Players[3].Name :='';
 Players[3].Pass :='';
 Players[3].Nick :='';
 Players[3].Loc  :='';
 Players[3].Skill:='Mining';
 Players[3].Active:=True;
 Players[3].Ore:='Random';

end;

procedure PrinceMouse(A,b:integer);
begin
MouseSpeed:=3;
Mouse(A,b,10,10,true);
end;

Procedure bank;
begin
if(BankScreen)then
begin
Wait(Random(1000)+2000);
FixBank;
DepositAll;
Wait(Random(1000)+2000);
CloseWindow;
Banks:=Banks+1;
end;
end;

procedure SetUp;
var x,y:integer;
begin
WriteLn(’|–| |—| |- | |—) |—| |----|’);
WriteLn(’|–| |—| | - | |- ) |—| | ----|’);
WriteLn(’|-| | | | - | |- ) |—| | _–|’);
WriteLn(’|—| | | | -| |—) |—| | _-|’);
WriteLn(‘Random Miner’+VersionNumber);
WriteLn(VersionNumber);
WriteLn('Some problems are '+improvements);
SetUpSrl;
SetUpSrlMining;
SetUpDemon;
if not LoggedIn then RandomNextPlayer(True)
begin
Face(‘N’);
PerfectNorth;
KeyDown(VK_RIGHT);
Sleep(300);
KeyUp(VK_RIGHT);
if FindSymbol(X,y,‘bank’) then
begin
WriteLn(‘Have found bank symbol’);
PrinceMouse(X,y);
end else
Writeln(‘Your not in the bank -.- OR too many peeps are on the symbol =(’);
WriteLn(‘Running script assuming you are in the bank’);
end;
begin
if not GetCurrentTab = 4 then
GameTab(4);
begin
FindPickHeadColor;
end;
end;
end;

function ReturnWherePickIs:integer;
begin
if WieldPick = false then begin
Result:=2;
end else
Result:=1;
end;

function FindMMPixelArea(x, y, color: integer): boolean;//Made By XxKanexX Tweaked by me\
var
a, b: integer;
begin
if(findcolortolerance(a, b, color, x-4, y-4, x+4, y+4, 2))then
result:= true;
end;

function KRoadColor(BaseC: integer): integer;//Made By XxKanexX Tweaked By
var //Me
x, y, bcol: integer;
begin
if(BaseC <= 0)then
bcol:= 7369081
else
bcol:= BaseC;
if(findcolortolerance(x, y, bcol, 573, 7, 722, 162, 5))then
if(FindMMPixelArea(x, y, bcol))then
result:= getcolor(x, y);
if(result = 0)then
result:= -1;
end;

Procedure RoadWalk2(Direct:string);
begin
GetNewRoadColor(m1,m2,m3,m4,20);
case Direct of
‘N’ : RoadWalk(KRoadColor(RoadColor),‘N’);
‘W’ : RoadWalk(KRoadColor(RoadColor),‘W’);
‘E’ : RoadWalk(KRoadColor(RoadColor),‘E’);
‘S’ : RoadWalk(KRoadColor(RoadColor),‘S’);
‘NW’ : RoadWalk(KRoadColor(RoadColor),‘NW’);
‘NE’ : RoadWalk(KRoadColor(RoadColor),‘NE’);
‘SE’ : RoadWalk(KRoadColor(RoadColor),‘SE’);
‘SW’ : RoadWalk(KRoadColor(RoadColor),‘SW’);
end;
end;

Procedure RoadBank;
begin
if FindBank(‘VEB’) then
CountFlag(4);
Bank;
end;

function ColorGet(color:Integer):boolean;
var
vx, vy, z, t:Integer;
begin
GetClientDimensions(vx, vy)
for t:= 0 to vy do
for z:= 0 to vx do
if (getcolor(z, t)=Color) then
begin
Result:=True;
Writeln(InttoSTr(color)+’ found at (’+Inttostr(t)+’, ‘+inttostr(z)+’)’);
Break;
end;
end;

function MineDone: Boolean;
var
Mmark, a , Mtime : Integer;
begin
MarkTime(Mmark);
repeat
A:=A+1
wait(100)
until(FindChatText(‘swing your pick’)) or (A=25);
begin
repeat
wait(500+random(400));
until(FindChatText(‘to mine some’)) or (TimeFromMark(Mmark)>Mtime);
if(FindChatText(‘to mine some’))then
begin
Result:=true;
end else
if (TimeFromMark(Mmark)>Mtime)then
begin
Result:=false;
end;
end;
end;

Function LoadingScreen: Boolean;
var mx, my: integer;
begin
if (FindMMColor(mx, my, 0)) then
Result := True;
end;

Function LagHandle():boolean;
Var TimeOut:integer;
begin
MarkTime(TimeOut);
begin
if LoadingScreen then
repeat
Result:=true;
Wait(200);
if TimeOut < 30000 then Break;
if LoggedIn then break;
Until(not LoggedIn);
end;
end;

procedure WalkingRandoms(Stage:integer);
begin
if not LoggedIn then
case Stage of
1 : RoadWalk(KRoadColor(RoadColor),‘NE’);
2 : RoadWalk(KRoadColor(RoadColor),‘NE’);
3 : RoadWalk(KRoadColor(RoadColor),‘NE’);
4 : RoadWalk(KRoadColor(RoadColor),‘E’);
5 : RoadWalk(KRoadColor(RoadColor),‘E’);
6 : bank ;
end;
end;

function OreCColor:integer;
begin
Result:=RockColor;
end;

function ChickenObj(var SSI, Squig: Integer; ObjText: string; ColoringInPencils, Tollipop:Longint):Boolean;
begin
if(FindObj(SSI, Squig, ObjText, ColoringInPencils, Tollipop))then
begin
Result:= True;
Mouse(SSI, Squig, 5+ Random(5), 5 + Random(5), True);
CountFlag(4);
end else
if(FindObj(SSI, Squig, ObjText, ColoringInPencils, tollipop + Random(6)))then
begin
Result:= True;
Mouse(SSI, Squig, 5+Random(5), 5+Random(5), True);
CountFlag(2);
end else
begin
begin
Result:= False;
end;
end;
end;

procedure DropOre;
var i:integer;
begin
benmouse:=false;
if Powermine=true then
for i:=ReturnWherePickIs to 28 do DropItem(i);
benmouse:=true;
end;

procedure WalktoMine;
var x,y:integer;
begin
if FindSymbol(X,y,‘water’) then
begin
wait(2000+random(3000));
gametab (4);
mouse (585,234,3,3,true);
wait(2000+random(3000));
face (‘N’);
CountFlag(2);
RoadWalkTol(KRoadColor(RoadColor),‘N’,10);
CountFlag(2);
RoadWalkTol(KRoadColor(RoadColor),‘E’,10);
CountFlag(2);
RoadWalkTol(KRoadColor(RoadColor),‘E’,10);
CountFlag(2);
RoadWalkTol(KRoadColor(RoadColor),‘N’,10);
CountFlag(2);
RoadWalkTol(KRoadColor(RoadColor),‘N’,10);
CountFlag(2);
RoadWalkTol(KRoadColor(RoadColor),‘N’,10);
CountFlag(2);
RoadWalkTol(KRoadColor(RoadColor),‘N’,10);
CountFlag(2);
RoadWalkTol(KRoadColor(RoadColor),‘N’,10);
CountFlag(2);
RoadWalkTol(KRoadColor(RoadColor),‘N’,10);
CountFlag(2);
RoadWalkTol(KRoadColor(RoadColor),‘E’,10);
CountFlag(2);
RoadWalkTol(KRoadColor(RoadColor),‘E’,10);
CountFlag(2);
RoadWalkTol(KRoadColor(RoadColor),‘E’,10);
CountFlag(2);
RoadWalkTol(KRoadColor(RoadColor),‘N’,10);
CountFlag(2);
RoadWalkTol(KRoadColor(RoadColor),‘N’,10);
CountFlag(2);
FindNormalRandoms
if FindSymbol(X,y,‘mine’) then
PrinceMouse(X,y);
CountFlag(2)(2);
face(‘n’);
end;
end;

procedure Progress_;
begin
WriteLn(’ ‘);
WriteLn(’ ‘);
WriteLn(’ ‘);
WriteLn(’<============== -’+VersionNumber+’- Progress Report ===============>’);
WriteLn(’<================= Problems are ‘+Improvements+’:================>’);
writeln('Worked for '+ TimeRunning);
WriteLn(‘Banked ‘+IntToStr(banks)+’ loads[s].’);
WriteLn(‘Mined ‘+IntToStr(MT)+’ Ores.’);

WriteLn(‘Random Event Report:’);
if(fights>0)then WriteLn(’ Fought ‘+IntToStr(fights)+’ Time[s].’);
if(talks>0)then WriteLn(’ Talked to ‘+IntToStr(talks)+’ Random event[s].’);
if(lamps>0)then WriteLn(’ Used lamps ‘+IntToStr(lamps)+’ Time[s].’);
if(Demons>0)then WriteLn(’ Solved ‘+IntToStr(Demons)+’ Demon[s].’);
if(logs>0)then WriteLn(’ Logged in ‘+IntToStr(logs)+’ Time[s].’);
WriteLn(’<=====================================================>’);
end;

function RDirection:string;
begin
Case random(7) of
1 : Result:=‘N’;
2 : Result:=‘E’;
3 : Result:=‘W’;
4 : Result:=‘NW’;
5 : Result:=‘NE’;
6 : Result:=‘SE’;
7 : Result:=‘SW’;
end;
end;

procedure Randoms_;
Var X,y:integer;
begin
CloseWindow;
Wait(1);
FindLamp(‘mining’);
Wait(1);
FindDead;
Wait(1);
FindMod;
Wait(1);
FindMime;
Wait(1);
FindMaze;
Wait(1);
FindQuiz;
Wait(1);
FindFrog;
Wait(1);
FindDemon;
Wait(1);
if(FindFight)then RunTo(RDirection,false);
Wait(1);
GambleNewBox;
Wait(1);
FindPick;
if not(Loggedin) then begin RandomNextPlayer(false);
Wait(1);
if FindGas(X,y) then
RunTo(Rdirection,false);
end;
end;

procedure MineOre_;
var X,y:integer;
begin
Prevcount:=InvCount;
if ChickenObj(X,y,‘Mine’,OreCcolor,10) then
begin
if MineDone = true then
MT:=MT+1;
end;
end;

function IfIAmLostICry:boolean;
var X,y:integer;
begin
if not FindColor(X,y,OreCcolor,S1,S2,S3,S4)then
Result:=True;
end;

procedure WalkToSomeMine;
var ,__:integer;
var Lost:boolean;
begin
RoadWalk(KRoadColor(RoadColor),‘E’);
CountFlag(2);
Randoms;
RoadWalk(KRoadColor(RoadColor),‘E’);
CountFlag(2);
Randoms_;
RoadWalk(KRoadColor(RoadColor),‘SW’);
CountFlag(2);
begin
RoadWalk(KRoadColor(RoadColor),‘SE’);
CountFlag(2);
RoadWalk(KRoadColor(RoadColor),‘S’);
CountFlag(2);
begin
RoadWalk(KRoadColor(RoadColor),‘S’);
CountFlag(2);
RoadWalk(KRoadColor(RoadColor),‘S’);
begin
if FindSymbol(,__,‘mining spot’)then
begin
PrinceMouse(,__);
CountFlag(2);
Randoms_;
end else
Lost:=true;
Randoms_;
end;
end;
end;
end;

Procedure BankForThrills;
var X,y:integer;
begin
if FindSymbol(X,y,‘Mining spot’) then
begin
PrinceMouse(X,y);
CountFlag(2);
end else
Lost_:=true;
begin
RoadWalk(KRoadColor(RoadColor),‘NE’);
WriteLn(‘Stage 1’);
CountFlag(2);
Randoms_;
RoadWalk(KRoadColor(RoadColor),‘NE’);
WriteLn(‘Stage 2’);
CountFlag(2);
Randoms_;
RoadWalk(KRoadColor(RoadColor),‘NE’);
WriteLn(‘Stage 3’);
CountFlag(2);
Randoms_;
RoadWalk(KRoadColor(RoadColor),‘NE’);
WriteLn(‘Stage 4’);
CountFlag(2);
Randoms_;
RoadWalk(KRoadColor(RoadColor),‘E’);
WriteLn(‘Stage 5’);
Randoms_;
RoadWalk(KRoadColor(RoadColor),‘E’);
WriteLn(‘Stage 6’);

  CountFlag(2);
    begin
      if FindBank('VEB') then
      CountFlag(2);
        Randoms_
        Bank;
    end;
end;

end;

procedure MineOreForThrills;
begin
repeat
MineOre_;
Randoms_;
until(InvFull);
end;

begin
DeclarePlayers;
SetUp;
WalkToSomeMine;
repeat
MineOreforThrills;
if PowerMine = false then
begin
BankForThrills;
Progress_;
WalkToSomeMine;
end else
DropOre;
until(False);
end.[/code]

Read full topic
